Instruction: Place the sliced baguette on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes, or until the baguette slices are lightly toasted.
In a bowl, mash the goat cheese with honey until smooth.
Spread a layer of goat cheese mixture onto each toasted baguette slice.
Top each crostini with fresh gooseberries.
Serve immediately as a delightful appetizer or side dish.
